tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I recently had the pleasure of visiting Dr. Rohan mahajan, a gastroenterologist, and I couldn't be more satisfied with my experience. From the moment I walked into the chamber, I felt welcomed and at ease.

Dr. Rohan mahajan is exceptionally patient-friendly. He takes the time to listen to your concerns and answers all questions thoroughly, ensuring that you feel heard and understood. His compassionate and approachable demeanor immediately puts you at ease, making the entire process much less stressful.

In terms of treatment satisfaction, Dr. Rohan mahajan is top-notch. He explained my diagnosis of IBS clearly and provided a detailed treatment plan that was easy to follow. The results have been outstanding, and I feel much better under his care. His follow-up is also excellent, demonstrating a genuine concern for his patients' well-being.

review:
Hello readers I want to share my feedback with all of you ..
Dr Rohan sir is very  nice person
But my experience was totally wrst with the treatment 
I was facing the fissure pain  from the beginning 
When I visited to doctor I told him about that pain I was suffering I got the medicine from him but there was no relief..
Then after a week doctor told me for Sigmoidoscopy test that costed me 3k 
After the test doctor told me that I have a piles I said ok now what's the treatment he again gave me almost same medicine for 15 days and Also told me that u have to come after a week I will inject the medicine inside..
After a week he injected the medicine I was feeling better but for 3 day after 3 days I was on same stage I told him about the same pain I was suffering but no treatment I got... Even I tried to contact him  only 2 times in 1 month treatment and he was not available for call on that time I was suffering from badly wrst pain but he was not available *** ***** ** * **** ****** ** ********* * ***** **** *** **** ** ** **** * * *** * ******* ****** * **** *** ** ** **** ********* ***** ****** ** ** * *** ***** *** **** ********** *********** ** ****** **** **** ***** ******* ** **** *** **** ** **** **** **** ** **** **** *** *** *** ******** ** *** *** ******* ** *********
So please avoid to visit üôè
I taked 1 month treatment ******* *** ******
Almost spent 25k to 27k 
Medicines are so expensive
Please save your time and money
They also worte on the if you don't get relief seek for another option
Please avoid..

tags: None
review:
Dr Rohan is *** ** *** ****** *** youngest doctor I have come across.
I have consulted him multiple times for my dad's health related issues and he creates a level of comfort both with the patient and attendant.
He has been instrumental in keeping my dad's sugar in check and other kidney related issues.
His advice is always to the point and has shown lot of maturity while handling any health related issue.
I am forever indebted for his advise and constant monitoring in keeping my parents (borh dad and mom) health in check and over come covid without much trouble.
He is a gem of a doctor at such a young age.
I recommend him to others as well.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: My mom took consultation from Dr Rohan at his hospital , to which i accompanied her. Me and my mom were very satisfied with the whole experience. She did not have to wait for long, Dr Rohan listened to all her complaints patiently and then advised some lifestyle modifications and few medicines. He did not immediately write a long list of tests or investigations which we have often encountered in other hospitals...all in all, he seemed very approachable and yet confident about his profession and we will surely visit him again for follow up, if the need arises.
